DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether green tea or cocoa extracts are effective in improve endothelial dysfunction in patients with diabetes mellitus and nephropathy and arterial hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Green Tea or Cocoa Extracts in Endothelial Dysfunction in Patients With Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Type 1 or type 2 diabetes mellitus Diabetic nephropathy Hypertension GFR < 30 ml/min/1.73m2 Serum K > 5.5 mEq/L Age < 18 y Pregnancy Breast feeding Cocoa or green tea intolerance Alcohol and drugs abuse Incapacity to understand the information related to the study
